fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, Economy, finance and the euro, Agriculture, Budget, Trade, Competition, Consumers, Customs, Energy, Business and Industry, Environment, Taxation, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Single market, External Relations, Digital economy and society, Communication, Banking and financial services, Fraud prevention
head_office_address: IPK European Strategy 300 Vauxhall Bridge Road
eu_initiatives: IPK follows and advises on all matters concerning global financial markets, including regulatory issues in the UK, EU and US, trade policy as well as economic affairs. IPK also advises on markets and competition matters.
goals__remit: To provide high level strategic advice based on timely and relevant high-level intelligence, to inform technically sound analysis as the basis of political and strategic advice in the fields of public policy.
relevant_communication:
IPK advises clients on a bilateral basis and is therefore involved in advising clients on implementation of financial regulation, trade policy, competiton and sustainability. 
 
IPK also advises on global supply chain.
customers: Managed Funds Association# AVISA Partners# Flint Global Ltd
